website_summaries.verdict: Traditional finishing and German engineering make this barometer an elegant addition to a study, nautical-themed room or weather station.
pros: Displays barometer pressure in both millibars and imperial units
Wooden frame with brass bezel and mineral glass cover
Hang from wall using brass suspension ring
cons: Not for use at altitudes above 3,000 feet

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well-made and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made and accurate. This little beauty isn't plastic, but real wood and brass, but made of solid metal, German-engineered components and a nice, solid wood frame. So far it's been perfectly in keeping with the local weather stations, and I expect it will keep on being spot-on accurate for a long time to come. It's exactly what I was hoping for. And it looks good! It also arrived in good time and in good shape, despite some mangling of the outer box. The inner box and packaging protected it beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: D. King

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: The barometer is a beautiful piece that adds charm to the room. Very nice quality. It was easy to set so that is is accurate for the elevation in my state. Appears to be accurate as I have checked the readings against those published on the Weather Channel.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome barometer!
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated with awful forecasts from the internet, I got this. So far, I've learned a lot about forecasting, but then again I started at zero. Educational for the kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Lkjh234

customer_reviews.title: Classic and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: A working treasure! Make sure you calibrate it a couple times with your local airport.
customer_reviews.author: kelly reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality piece. It's spot on to a NOAA weather station less than a mile from my house. Looks beautiful to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph l Carr iv

customer_reviews.title: So far it doesn't agree with local waether service barometer.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I have set it three times so far in two weeks and today it was off by 2 inches! If it settles down I will repost.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pinch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Barometer
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to have this beautiful quality barometer. As described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely constructed barometer at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed barometer at a reasonable price. The only nit pick I have is that the needle does tend to stick a little. A small tap will move the needle to it's correct position. I expect that issue to disappear after the unit has been used a while. I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: customer 29

customer_reviews.title: German quality.
customer_reviews.text: Typical German quality in an attractive package. I check with my barometer multiple times every day.
customer_reviews.author: Taso Gounaris

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Accurate Barometer
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate - better than what the Weather Channel's forecast these days. Quality made and very attractive. Packaging for shipping was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tenaj

customer_reviews.title: So glad I got this
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful barometer that looks really nice hanging on the wall near the door. The wood is beautifully finished and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: at least this one works, more than I can say about others I bought works great , love it, accurate little smaller than I wanted but the larger one I bought does not work at all , stick with this one
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kelliher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very happy with this barometer. It is easy to read and looks beautiful on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tacitus

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Anyone interested in the weather should own one. A necessary indicator of what tomorrow will bring weather wise.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: its a great barometer. i set it to NOAA and its been dead on ever since. looks great, accurate, great buy. your not going to get a decent barometer for less money. made in germany, more importantly...not made in china.
customer_reviews.author: stoned!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic barometer. I bought it for my mom. She loves it. I would highly recommend. It is bigger then it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: haydenlady

customer_reviews.title: Amazon order of Fischer 1436R-12 Barometer
customer_reviews.text: This is the the greatest barometer ever made. I would recommend it to everyone. Excellent service by the seller. How do you like this Amazon??
customer_reviews.author: chester daniel

customer_reviews.title: Fine Instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is a marine quality barometer that is very accurate. I was really pleased to see that it is beautifully hand crafted, and it looks terrific in my home. I live in the tropics where there are constant barometric pressure changes, and this barometer indicates the changes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: James Clark

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy, the one I received is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and it actually works
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and it actually works! Many weather instruments never do work properly but this one absolutely does. Surprisingly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Loma

customer_reviews.title: Health Guy
customer_reviews.text: Now I know when the ache's and pains are coming....Quality Instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: The real thing
customer_reviews.text: I had a barometer when I was a kid. It's nice to know that there are some things out there that haven't been digitized and are what they used to be. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LastLegion

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am satisfied with this product and it meets all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is superb. This product is also fairly accurate and the price is reasonable. Overall I am satisfied with this product and it meets all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on the wall, fun and interesting tool to track the weather. Seems accurate. My family loves it! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: EAT

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my son.. Hangs on wall in his office. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Lipari

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned needles
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective unit. The manually adjustable 'benchmark' needle and the barometer needle itself were misaligned so they would make contact as they crossed each other resulting in the barometer needle showing an erroneous reading.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T

customer_reviews.title: Barometer failed after only 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: This was accurate, but disappointed that it stopped working after having it only 9 months. Now I have to deal with warranty stuff. Note, the pamphlet that came with it said it had a 5 year limited warranty, but when you go on their website, it is only one year. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wood and Brass Wall Barometer made in Germany.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine quality barometer and I have it mounted on my office wall and it is a very handsome instrument that I use in my study of the weather. The unit is working fine and after adjusting it to the correct pressure for my location, the needle has risen and fallen just the way it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Bombero

customer_reviews.title: Accurate instrument.
customer_reviews.text: This Fischer 1436R-12 barometer is an accurate instrument. It works just great and I trust its readings because I checked it against information on the Internet (local weather site) hundreds of times.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri T.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Decided to keep this barometer
customer_reviews.text: I have grown to love its beauty AND accuracy, it simply needed me to appreciate the fact it IS NOT DIGITAL, AND THAT'S A GOOD THING. iT JUST DOESN'T REACT TO MINUTE CHGS IN MINUTES, it is steadier and I grew to understand this.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: This is beautiful and appears to be well made
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and appears to be well made. As far as I can tell it is accurate as well. For the money spent I am very happy with this purchase. If it still works well a year from now I would increase the rating to a perfect 5 stars, but time is always the test as experience has taught me. :)
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality German made instrument.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent barometer! First rate German made quality. Not the made in China junk that infests the marketplace. This is a highly accurate precision instrument that can be calibrated.to one's locale.
customer_reviews.author: G.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and well-made. I live in Arizona and have been quite surprised at how vagarious is the Barometric Pressure here. I have Arthritis and call this my "Arthrimeter".
customer_reviews.author: Fred Lord

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Product-Quality Looking
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday. Well packed with easy to understand directions for setting and understanding the settings. Very nice wood base and dial is great. Looks good in my family room.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality, but seemed to need constant adjustment at first. After a few weeks, seems pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: lovely piece
customer_reviews.text: matches my furniture and is a good looking piece! works too! good german engineerink!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice instrument. I set it to the local weather ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice instrument. I set it to the local weather service barometer, and it has been quite accurate ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Fine Instrument
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and precision matches the official measurements in this area. Looks good on our wall though there isn't much action here around Houston.
customer_reviews.author: BillWill

customer_reviews.title: ... Peninsula this is a much needed tool especially after super storm sandy
customer_reviews.text: Living on a Peninsula this is a much needed tool especially after super storm sandy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ruscillo Jr

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew what the pressure is in this area ( Eastern Shore Maryland). We do enjoy trying to read the change each day. Made very well, is beautiful on our wall.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Elegant looking. I think German made products hold up very well
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie1

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Great retirement gift for my brother in ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Great retirement gift for my brother in law.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good looking barometer and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking barometer and well made. Unfortunately, it isn't very accurate. I have this indoors for several months, including warm weather where windows are always open. It never seems to move from "Very Dry", even during days of heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: ederath

product_meta.title: Ambient Weather Fischer 1436R-12 Open Face Wood and Brass Barometer, 6 1/2"
product_meta.description: The USA version of this instrument displays the metric units (mbar) on the inner scale and imperial units (in Hg) on the outer scale.
feature_bullets: The USA version of this instrument displays the metric units (mbar) on the inner scale and imperial units (in Hg) on the outer scale.
This beautiful nautical instrument is made from the finest materials, and is at home with any marine decor.
The open face barometer features a bezel made of diamond polished brass, with a mineral glass cover.
The wooden case is stained and varnished and includes a brass suspension ring.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars62 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
